basics.summary: Mental Health Counselor specializing in Art and Play Therapies. Responsible self-starter who communicates well and is dedicated to improving the well-being of clients.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as lead clinician for patients with bipolar, depression, anxiety and personality disorders. Referenced and used various therapy techniques, including psychodynamic, family systems, cognitive behavioral and lifespan integration psychotherapy.
